name: MergeGithubBranch
description:
Merge a branch into a GitHub repository.

Use this tool when you need to merge one branch into another in a GitHub repository. It facilitates branch management by integrating changes from different branches.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository, not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: base_branch_name
parameters.description: The name of the base branch that the head will be merged into. This is the branch you want to merge changes into.

value_schema.description: The name of the base branch that the head will be merged into.

parameters.name: head_branch_or_commit_sha
parameters.description: The branch name or commit SHA1 to be merged into the base branch.

value_schema.description: The head to merge. This can be a branch name or a commit SHA1.

parameters.name: merge_commit_message
parameters.description: Custom commit message for the merge. Defaults to a standard message if not provided.

value_schema.description: Commit message to use for the merge commit. If omitted, a default message will be used.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: The name of the base branch that the head will be merged into.

value_schema.description: The name of the base branch that the head will be merged into.

parameters.name: commit_message
parameters.description: Commit message to use for the merge commit. If omitted, a default message will be used.

value_schema.description: Commit message to use for the merge commit. If omitted, a default message will be used.

parameters.name: head
parameters.description: The head to merge. This can be a branch name or a commit SHA1.

value_schema.description: The head to merge. This can be a branch name or a commit SHA1.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
